d.dealName, d.dealManager
from productorder pdor
left join dealer d ON pdor.dealer_dealSeq = d.dealSeq WHERE 1=1 ORDER BY pdor.pdorSeq DESC limit #{rowNumToShow} offset #{startRnumForMysql}

Select count(*)
From
productorder pdor left join productorderlist pdol ON pdol.productorder_pdorSeq = pdor.pdorSeq WHERE 1=1

select pdor.pdorSeq, pdor.pdorNum, pdor.pdorRegDate, pdor.pdorModDate, pdor.pdorTotalPrice, pdor.pdorStatusCd, d.dealName
ORDER BY pdor.pdorSeq DESC limit #{rowNumToShowNew} offset #{startRnumForMysqlNew}

select pdor.pdorSeq, pdor.pdorNum, pdor.pdorRegDate, pdor.pdorModDate, pdor.pdorTotalPrice, pdor.pdorStatusCd, d.dealName

SELECT a.pdolQty, a.pdolAmountPrice, b.prdtName, b.prdtSN FROM productorderlist a LEFT JOIN product b ON b.prdtSeq = a.product_prdtSeq WHERE 1=1 AND (SELECT pdorSeq FROM productorder WHERE 1=1 AND pdorNum = #{pdorNum}) = productorder_pdorSeq

select pdor.pdorSeq, pdor.pdorNum, pdor.pdorRegDate, pdor.pdorModDate, pdor.pdorTotalQty, pdor.pdorTotalPrice, pdor.pdorDesc, pdor.pdorDelNy, pdor.pdorStatusCd, pdor.dealer_dealSeq, d.dealName, d.dealManager
from productorder pdor left join dealer d ON pdor.dealer_dealSeq = d.dealSeq WHERE 1=1 and pdorSeq = #{pdorSeq}

select pdor.pdorSeq, pdor.pdorNum, pdor.pdorRegDate, pdor.pdorModDate, pdor.pdorTotalQty, pdor.pdorTotalPrice, pdor.pdorDesc, pdor.pdorDelNy, pdor.pdorStatusCd, pdor.dealer_dealSeq, pdol.pdolSeq, pdol.pdolQty, pdol.pdolAmountPrice, pdol.pdolDelNy, pdol.product_prdtSeq, pdol.pdolStatusCd, prdt.prdtName, prdt.prdtPrice, d.dealName, d.dealManager
from productorder pdor left join productorderlist pdol ON pdol.productorder_pdorSeq = pdor.pdorSeq left join product prdt on prdt.prdtSeq = pdol.product_prdtSeq left join dealer d ON pdor.dealer_dealSeq = d.dealSeq WHERE 1=1 and pdorSeq = #{pdorSeq} and pdolDelNy = 0

select tpol.tpolSeq ,tpol.tpolQty ,tpol.product_prdtSeq ,prdt.prdtName ,prdt.prdtPrice
from temporderlist tpol left join product prdt on prdt.prdtSeq = tpol.product_prdtSeq WHERE 1=1
mapper.update: update productorderlist set pdolDelNy = 1 where pdolSeq = #{pdolSeq}
update productorder set pdorStatusCd = #{pdorStatusCd}, pdorModDate = date_format(NOW(), '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%S') where pdorNum = #{pdorNum}
